text: E'itorae'i se'i susambada, yito allahe te'omra bandasakalaka diche, yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche. Koraa, ‘ma'i iyara binimayata tomalokara paraa kerala atmiyatara sauhardyara bahirae ana eko pratidana nibicarao’. Yiye uttama kama karae ami tara babe iyata kalyana brd'dhi karai di'om. Niscaya allaha atyanta ksamasila, gunagraahi
